inclusion.criterion: Moderate AS with AVA between 1-1.4cm2, and AVMG<40 mmHg
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%

inclusion.criterion: Cardiac related symptoms; shortness of breath, chest pain or syncope.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to exercise and undertake pharmacological stress
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Severe aortic or mitral regurgitation or severe mitral stenosis;
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Significant pulmonary disease like severe (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) or pulmonary fibrosis;
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Other known non-cardiovascular disease associated with poor prognosis like metastatic cancer.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Patient's EF is below the required threshold, and they have severe aortic insufficiency which may trigger exclusion. However, more information about their pulmonary disease and ability to provide informed consent would be helpful.
